attributes.action: the teaching of Saxonish in State Schools in the South of England
attributes.additional_details: State schools in the South of England to teach the Saxonish dialect as the native speech of the South Country as Welsh is taught in Wales as the speech of Wales. - (Sdate sgoles yn dheo Zowth ovf Angleland to teche Zeaxysch as dheo volksbeche ovf dheo Zowrtherryche lyke Welsch ys teched yn Welsch sgoles as dheo sbeche ovf Welschland.)
